From: Infralimbic area (ILA)
To: Medial nucleus of the amygdala posteroventral part (MEApv)
Description: Collator note: MEApv zones appears labeled heavily in Figures 3D-E, even though there is no supporting textual information. Exception maybe is in Figure 3F, which shows an empty field, just below the optic tract labeled as "MEA" by authors. This would correspond to MEApv in Swanson Atlas, level 29. Figures 3C-F that include the amygdalar nuclei may correspond to Swanson Atlas Levels 24-30, but this mapping may be valid only to ventral half.
Reference: Hurley KM, Herbert... - Efferent projections of the infralimbic... (1991) , pp. 409-76

From: Infralimbic area (ILA)
To: Medial nucleus of the amygdala posteroventral part (MEApv)
Description: The projections to the superficial amygdaloid nuclei were very dense (nucleus of the lateral olfactory tract, periamygdaloid cortex, medial nucleus and cortical nuclei Figs 3, 4B). Collator note: dense labeling in these nuclei, but not across all related Atlas Levels. For MEAp regions, strong labeling in all layers, rostrally. Fig. 3C, Swanson Atlas Levels 27-28 (-2.3 mm from bregma).
Reference: Mcdonald AJ,... - Projections of the medial and lateral... (1996) , pp. 55-75
